heading: ***FROST ADVISORIES TONIGHT******FROST AND FREEZE WARNINGS THURSDAY NIGHT***Tonight
text: A few stray evening showers north, then partly cloudy. Chilly. Lows in the 30s, near 30 over the higher terrain north. Scattered frost in sheltered valleys. Winds northwest 10 to 15 mph, gusting 20 to 30 mph, diminishing in wind-sheltered valleys.

heading: Thursday
text: Periods of clouds early giving way to sunshine. Quite cool. Highs in the upper 40s to mid 50s. Winds north to northwest 10 to 15 mph, decreasing through the afternoon.

heading: Thursday Night
text: Mostly clear and cold. Widespread frost and freezing temperatures. Lows in the mid 20s to low 30s, near 20 in the cold spots. Winds northwest near 10 mph in the evening, diminishing to light and variable.

heading: Friday
text: Mostly sunny and still cool. Highs in the upper 50s to low 60s. Winds light, mainly southwest less than 10 mph.
